reviews.review:
So far I have only played the co-op maps. I highly enjoyed playing with my partner in science.
The puzzles can be frustrating at times, and will require patience with positive attitude that's willing to tolerate making mistakes - multiple times. 

Personally, I enjoyed this game and the oportunity to learn more about contructive communication. I would recomend co-op for any pair that's willing to test their compatability.

Hoping for Portal 3

An amazing game overall even with out friends, the story is awesome it kinda continues where portal left off but even if you havent played portal you will have fun, you dont need that much knowledge about portal to understand the story because it will explain it to you. the coop mode is great especialy if you have a friend that will play with you, i totaly recomend this for any one. :)
Epic, have to google 2 riddles, not proud of myself, still got fun
The game is great. The story keeps you hooked to it and you just can't stop playing. The puzzles are pretty hard just like I wanted.

Cool game...

i like the Co op and the way the the friend (wheatly) turend into a asshole then the enemey (GLaDOS) became your friend
A worthy sequel. The first game was great, yet Portal 2 manages to surpass it. Highly recommended.
Really cool experience with tons of fun puzzles!
The same as Portal I - perfect

One of the best Co-op stories I have ever played. Excellent game overall, totally worth the money, especially if you get it on sales :) 

Cheers Volvo <3

Body: 10/10
One of my favorite games of all time with this combination of humor and puzzle gaming.

Pros:
- Really cool idea
- Really well designed puzzles
- Incredible story
- Memorable characters

Cons:
NONE!

Verdict:
This must buy puzzle game is incredible! :)

Pretty good game. I felt it didn't capture the same atmosphere as the first game but it was still incredibly fun and the story was interesting.

New puzzle solving mechanics as well. Good job boys!
Awesome game. Very fun coop game! Highly recommended.
In my opinion, one of the best games Valve ever created. it's worth it to buy and play.

I've only just started playing Portal 2, the story so far is so funny with the little robot talking to u its great. 
I also got a great deas so for the price i payed for it i highly recomend. I think even if it wasnt on sale i would still recomend this at full price due to endless hours of extra workshop content. A must buy for a brain teaser

Le jeu est ennorme un des meilleurs de valve je l'ai fini au moins 4 fois l'histoire est cool et surtout MEME AVEC UN ORDI POURRI TU PEUX AVOIR 60FPS
Tr√®s bon jeux dont la r√©putation n'est plus √† faire. Des puzzle de tout niveaux, avec une bonne histoire derri√®re et des touches d'humour agr√©ables.
Play story mode only once to learn the new possibilities. Then head straight to map making and community testchambers. Fantastic. Wish there were more games like these.

The first one was great, and this...this is just mastery. 

PROS:
Long single player mode. Not just doable quickly
Online Multiplayer
Customization: Customise your Co-Op characters apearence and even make your own Test Chambers for your freinds to play!
Interesting storyline: Lots of lore to uncover as you play.
Memorable characters: Character personalities well developed and extremely likable
Comedy: Humerous Dialouge throught
A breathtaking ending which I wont give away.

CONS:
Puzzles were sometimes fustrating. That may just be me.
There was a lack of unique enviroments. Every room was just grey.

I struggled to think of cons, so dont hate.

Overall, Portal 2 is hands down one of my all time favrioute games. This review is short because I really dont know what to say. Its just so amazing! Definently a must-have for Steam users! JUST BUY THIS DAMN GAME!
Gra w ktorej trzeba troche poglowkowac zeby przejsc poziom, przyjemna rozgrywka w dodatku z kooperacja Polecam kupic :)

So many tests, so little time. But there's plenty of cake to be had :)
